QuestData.Title: The Forlorn Soul
QuestData.Description:
Where's my ma'da? You seen her?
"I'll be right back," she said. I'm a good girl, I wait. I wait and wait, I'm not sure how long I've been waiting here for.
It's cold and lonely here. Hey... could you help me find ma'da? I swear I won't cause you any trouble.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Keula's mother hasn't been seen in generations.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Keula locate her ma'da within the Necropolis.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bwonsamdi within the Edge of Oblivion.
